title: LFM Team Lemonparty wants you
body:
Looking for a mid, Top and a jg and also some subs, we have no real requirements as such but we would prefer players who have a good attitude, are willing to develop themselves as an individual player as well as a team.

if interested please request me to add you and fill out this simple form.

summoner name:
Age:
preferred role:
Favourite champion(s):
Current rank(not so important):

Thanks and see you on the rift.
